name: FIND THEM (Skyrgamur)
description:
You wake up in the cellar of an abandoned clock tower, with no recollection of how you got there, other than a distinct face. A face you remember fondly...

This is my entry for Brackey's Game Jam #2, where we had one week to make a game related to the jams theme.

Controls are simple: WASD or Arrow keys to move, and Space to jump. Hold Space to Jump higher and further.
